Package javax.resource

The javax.resource package is the top-level package for the J2EE Connector API specification.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Referenceable The Referenceable interface extends the javax.naming.Referenceable interface.
 

Exception Summary
NotSupportedException NotSupportedException is thrown to indicate that callee (resource adapter or application server for system contracts) cannot execute an operation because the operation is not a supported feature.
ResourceException This is the root interface of the exception hierarchy defined for the Connector architecture.
 

Package javax.resource Description

The javax.resource package is the top-level package for the J2EE Connector API specification.
